message_catalog.msg: I have read and accept the terms and conditions for this event
Please provide us with other accommodation choices you are fine with in case your first choice isn't available. This will increase your chances of coming to our camp.
Please let us know if you are fine to share a double bed with another person (male, female), have a special someone whom you want to share your bed with or any other comments regarding accommodation.
Do you have any further comments for us?
Please enter the Facebook URL to your Event. If unsure, open your event in facebook and copy the URL
Please enter the Facebook URL to your Organization where people can follow you for updates

Dear %first_names%,

You are almost done!
To register please click the following link:

Register for %event_name%

Your %event_name% Crew.

To receive updates give us a like:
%facebook_orga_url%

To see who else is coming and coordinate ride shares and such, join the event:
%facebook_event_url%
Your list does not contain E-Mail addresses or names we can use. Please correct

Dear %first_names%,

Attached you will find your invoice. Please check that everything is okay and let us know if changes are needed.

We can't wait to meet you at the castle!
Full payment of %total_due_pretty% %currency% is due August 1st 2015
Here's what you have signed up for:
In case you need the bank's address:
Please find below your order with us:
Please make your initial payment of at least %due_now_pretty% %currency% to our bank account within the next 3 days.
Please provide us with your first and lastname and click submit to receive your registration link via E-Mail

And to check out the second week of dancing at the Sodom & Gomorrha of Swing visit:
http://www.swingcastlecamp.de
There was an error processing your request:
To complete the registration and reserve your spot, please click below for the payment information:

To receive updates give us a like:
%facebook_orga_url%

To see who else is coming and coordinate ride shares and such, join the event:
%facebook_event_url%
We have reserved a spot for you at %event_name%.
You will receive an E-Mail if we have found a space for you. This might take a couple of days, please be patient.
Your mail with the registration link is on its way! Make sure to look in the spam folder as well if you do not receive the mail shortly.
Assign others to the rooms for %project_name%
Please provide us with the email address of your partner so we can inform her/him and make sure both of you get the partner rebate. This does not apply to Solo / Tap classes
Your partner invited you to the event, so you are unable to change the course, role and partner.
partner text must be an email address, full name, or both
Thank you for the payment of %currency% %payment_amount%. You have now fully paid for %event_name% and your invoice %invoice_nr% is settled.
Payment received for %event_name% - You are fully registered
Thank you for the payment of %currency% %payment_amount_pretty% for %event_name%. You have now paid a total %currency% %paid_amount_pretty% of the invoiced amount for invoice

%participant_person_name% (%participant_email%) has registered for %event_name@% and would like to have you as his/her partner.
You can register by followining the link below: %event_registration_link% "
This is the number of additional beds/mattresses which might be moved into this room
Please provide us with some of your skills
You can find the terms at http://swingcastlecamp.de/terms.php
